Text: This book is a classic. The author is or was on the faculty of the medical school at the University of Pennsylvania. This is the same Pennsylvania as is home to the Philadelphia Eagles who are going to the Super Bowl under their new coach. Dr.  Burns mentor, whose name I can't remember, was a pioneer in the field of cognitive therapy.
a very good book. Do you have the handbook too?
Also interested in the handbook! It's been floating around the web for a while as a PDF/epub/djvu, but it's disappeared. Apparently it's also somewhere as a RAR package.
